message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $14000 for this exceptional item. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, my budget is limited to $12000 for this purchase. I am willing to negotiate further if possible.
